title: Boaz Redeems Ruth
summary: In Ruth 4, Boaz meets the other relative, who declines to redeem Ruth. Boaz then publicly redeems the land and marries Ruth. They have a son named Obed, who becomes the grandfather of King David.

faq.question: How does Boaz redeem Ruth?
faq.answer: He legally purchases the land and marries her, continuing the family line.

faq.question: Why is Ruthâ€™s story important?
faq.answer: She becomes the great-grandmother of David, linking her to the lineage of Jesus.
